awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 22 nominations.

fullplot: Made for cable television remake of the 1957 classic about twelve jurors quick to condemn a Latino youth on trial for murdering his father before reviewing the evidence. Juror #8 holds out with a verdict of not guilty, thus setting the stage for arguments and reasons why or why not the boy may be guilty.
plot: Twelve men must decide the fate of one when one juror objects to the jury's decision.
title: 12 Angry Men
